explains: n. 教练，导师；<美>大学讲师
wordGroup: fitness instructor 健美师；健身指导
training instructor 训练教官；训练导师

sentences.en: The plane was piloted by the instructor.
Her instructor plugged live bullets into the gun's chamber.
sentences.cn: 她的教官将实弹装入了枪膛。

sentences.en: She ran off with an intellectually challenged ski instructor.
sentences.cn: 她与一位有智力障碍的滑雪教练私奔了。
